98b0cab3bb07.title: Why not just pretend this is 1966 and ask Jordan how they feel about it?

paragraphs.name: a6e2
paragraphs.text: Why not just pretend this is 1966 and ask Jordan how they feel about it? The West Bank was part of Jordan until 1967, just like the Gaza Strip was part of Egypt. None of this was part of “Palestine”.
